name: Karen Rogers
text: Would have given higher than 5 stars if available. Great team to work with from the beginning to the end. Everything was handled in a professional and timely manner by great staff. We love our door! Paid a lot less than purchasing from big box and received a much better detailed and quality product.

name: Garry Bird
text: We received our refinished front door today.  It took about 3 1/2 weeks from removal to reinstallation, and it was worth the wait.  The door was refinished much better than anticipated--the door faces the afternoon sun and hadn't been maintained since installation five years ago.  I'm also very impressed with the two people who removed the door, came by a few times to refinish the outside trim, and reinstall the door.  They were so professional and very informative.  I really recommend this company.  The quality of the service we got was extraordinary.

name: JK nerdy
text: The doors, glass, and hardware here are beautiful! They make all kinds of amazing units for new homes or retro fit. Having worked with them for many years, I can tell you they are great people as well.

name: Riverside Transmission
text: The Only Place to Buy Doors !  Most Beautiful Doors I've ever seen , and that's what All my neighbors say too, and I live in a high dollar neighborhood .  Doors were ready Ahead of schedule, people are Great , the bid was in Plane English not door shop short hand.  We had some issues and they took care of it , they stand behind their work .  If you're not sure which wood, Get the Mahogany  you will stare at it in amazement   for hours .  God Bless these people.

name: Brenda Dolan
text: We purchased a 10 foot tall and approximately 6 feet wide arched double custom made front entry door. It is absolutely gorgeous !! We worked closely with JK to get the exact stain and hardware we wanted. They are professional throughout the whole process! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for your kind review. We would love to have a picture to put on our website.

name: Mary Battaglia
text: Very helpful professional people to assist me with the decisions about the doors. Very patient and made useful suggestions. Great service.

resp.text: Thanks for the nice review. We hope you enjoy your new door!!

name: Beth Kent
text: Website easy

name: Russell Lamkin
text: Beautiful doors and stained glass by a company that stands behind what they sell.

name: R. Cherri Pitts
text: This company is top notch - their new showroom is beautiful, they rep quality products and multiple price points and are a pleasure to work with.  Over the last 15 years, I've worked on multiple projects with them and highly recommend them if you need help with windows, doors, trim hardware and even specialty items like decorative columns.

name: Mona Thompson
text: Currently working with Holcombe Windows and Doors on a project in Gadsden Alabama.  I'm the designer and located in Little Rock, Arkansas.  Doing business long distance can be tricky.  This firm is making it so easy and a pleasure to work with.  I highly recommend them.

name: Jade Bertovic
text: My husband and I were in desperate need of replacement windows for our new (to us) home. We had been putting off the process and finally bit the bullet when a friend recommended Holcombe Doors and Windows. Before we replaced our windows, our rooms were stifling hot in the summer and freezing in the winter even with the A/C or heat running. Which also meant our power bills were much higher than need be. As soon as we replaced our old windows with new, efficient windows from Holcombe Doors and Windows, we could tell a HUGE difference not only in the appearance, but our rooms were no longer hot in the summer or cold in the winter! Holcombe did an outstanding job helping us decide what windows were right for our home and completing the job. Their customer service and install team were professional, friendly and helpful. We are beyond pleased with the job Holcombe did for us, and will definitely be using them again!

name: Glyna Humm
text: We called Holcombe Doors & Windows to replace our bay window in the kitchen.  They were very responsive and sent someone right out to give us a quote which was very competitive. The job from start to finish was a great experience.

name: Hillary Pody
text: I would definitely recommend Holcombe Door and Window. Love my front door and new hardware. Friendly, knowledgable staff who were a pleasure to work with.

name: Christie Wood
text: I have recently replaced all of my windows in my home.  We checked with a few different companies before choosing Holcombe Doors and Windows.  I am so glad we found them.  We love our new windows and the service was great.  I would recommend them.

name: Fulton Ramsay
text: Quality products.

name: Jeanie Shea
text: I ordered two custom floating shelves for my newly updated kitchen and was very pleased with how they turned out. I was able to select the type of wood, the stain color and a grey wash along with a texture that finished off my shelves. The owner and his side-kick were knowledgeable, helpful and had my shelves ready on time. Be sure to check this place out if looking for a fireplace mantel, beans for your ceiling and lots of other types of wood uses.

name: Tray Wilson
text: Very professional and very nice wood

name: Jessica Wilson
text: I am an employee at River Bottom Pine and take it from me, there is no better place to the best quality hard wood floors and meet the best people. Everyone there not only cares about your business but they care about you as well.

name: Philip Flores
text: The best wood flooring and custom beam mill in the south east! Very friendly beautiful craftsman’s live edge tables. Very nice selection of custom barn doors. Highly recommend! Philip Flores

name: Wesley Meier
text: Amazing company! Great products!

name: Cohen Palmer
text: Usually fast and easy.

name: Ann Legg
text:
Your people were very helpful.
They even used the fork lift to get more product down for us.

name: Steve Russell
text: The crew here goes out of their way to help me and my business.

name: rod rosser
text: Sam helps everyone. Great employee. Deresa ( misspelled maybe) is also a great Smiling helper.

name: David Cunningham
text: They quickly located the tool I needed online and guided me right to it. Thank you.

name: Joseph Woodham
text: A good visit,  employees very helpful with selection of product.

name: Bill Tiemann
text: The pro desk was very helpful in locating product and very friendly.

name: Laroy Kirkland
text: Great people......cece is fantastic service pro

name: Alden Harrison
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: Clay Edwards
text: The place to call for all types of custom cabinetry.
